net.tmachine.gpg4.gameserver
Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
  net.tmachine.gpg4.gameserver.FileManager
public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object

Note: this class is entirely composed of static methods and variables, for convenience of quickly and easily creating an example class that loads and caches files. There is no special reason for this other than convenience
